The tweet by Physics: astronomy.org (@OrgPhysics) claiming to show Hurricane Dorian from the coasts of Florida.
The video clip uploaded by Brent Shavnor: which was later confirmed to be a digitally-created artwork and not an actual footage of Hurricane Dorian.
The email conversation with Brent Shavno: where he admitted that the video is an animated version of a composite image he created using Shutterstock pictures.
The Instagram post by TheGlitch: describing the animation as a piece of artwork and providing credits to Brent Shavnore for the photos and TheGlitch for the animation.
